description: An easy ap for privacy on GNOME.

There is really no need for this to be an app just to toggle on the Tor connection. And I don't really understand the purpose of manually setting and unsetting the system wide proxy, why is it not set automatically by default? The functionality is perfect but the UX design needs to improve. This could have been just a Gnome Extension running in the background like Caffeine or GSConnect, that way the connections wouldn't create problems even if I close the app.
summary: This could have been a Gnome Extension

description: یکی از بهترین ابزارها برای کار با تور.
